Uses of Class
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Table

  • Packages that use Table 
    Package Description
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui  

    • Uses of Table in com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui

      Subclasses of Table in com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Button
      A button is a Table with a checked state and additional style fields for pressed, unpressed, and checked.
      class  CheckBox
      A checkbox is a button that contains an image indicating the checked or unchecked state and a label.
      class  Dialog
      Displays a dialog, which is a modal window containing a content table with a button table underneath it.
      class  ImageButton
      A button with a child Image to display an image.
      class  ImageTextButton
      A button with a child Image and Label.
      class  TextButton
      A button with a child Label to display text.
      class  Window
      A table that can be dragged and act as a modal window.
      Methods in com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui that return Table 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Table Table.align(int align)
      Alignment of the logical table within the table actor.
      Table Table.background(Drawable background) 
      Table Table.background(java.lang.String drawableName) 
      Table Table.bottom()
      Adds Align.bottom and clears Align.top for the alignment of the logical table within the table actor.
      Table Table.center()
      Sets the alignment of the logical table within the table actor to Align.center.
      Table Table.debug() 
      Table Table.debug(Table.Debug debug)
      Turns debug lines on or off.
      Table Table.debugActor()
      Turns on actor debug lines.
      Table Table.debugAll() 
      Table Table.debugCell()
      Turns on cell debug lines.
      Table Table.debugTable()
      Turns on table debug lines.
      Table Dialog.getButtonTable() 
      Table Dialog.getContentTable() 
      Table Cell.getTable() 
      Table Window.getTitleTable() 
      Table Table.left()
      Adds Align.left and clears Align.right for the alignment of the logical table within the table actor.
      Table Table.pad(float pad)
      Sets the padTop, padLeft, padBottom, and padRight around the table to the specified value.
      Table Table.pad(float top, float left, float bottom, float right) 
      Table Table.pad(Value pad)
      Sets the padTop, padLeft, padBottom, and padRight around the table to the specified value.
